recommended_degree: Pendidikan Tata Boga, Tata Boga, Perhotelan, Hospitaliti dan Pariwisata, Hospitality dan Pariwisata (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist the kitchen team with basic food preparation and mise en place.
- Support plating, portioning, and maintaining food quality standards.
- Help ensure kitchen cleanliness, hygiene, and proper food storage.
- Assist in receiving and organizing ingredients and supplies.
- Follow safety and sanitation procedures according to hotel standards.
- Support chefs during service operations when needed.
